LinearEquation
LinearEquation

Represents a linear equation (y = mx + b).

Functions
LinearEquation
LinearEquation()

Creates a default constructed LinearEquation object.  (slope = 1.0, offset = 0.0)

float slope,
float offset
)

Creates a LinearEquation object.

Parameters
slope
float

The slope of the linear equation.

offset
float

The offset of the linear equation

Variables
m_slope
float m_slope

The slope of the linear equation (m in y=mx+b).

m_offset
float m_offset

The offset of the linear equation (b in y=mx+b).
